# Vibe Icon - Microsoft Fluent Icons Web Component

## Installation

Add this script tag to your HTML:

```html
<script src="https://esm.sh/vibe-icon@0.0.5" type="module"></script>
```

## Usage

Use the `<vibe-icon>` component with these attributes:

- `name` (required): Icon name from the list below
- `filled` (optional): Shows filled variant when present
- `size` (optional): Icon size (e.g., "20", "24")

## Examples

```html
<vibe-icon name="home"></vibe-icon>
<vibe-icon name="settings" filled></vibe-icon>
<vibe-icon name="search" size="24"></vibe-icon>
```

## Available Icons (about 200 of the most common)

**Icon name format**: Use lowercase with hyphens (e.g., "arrow-down", "mail-send", "video-call")

## 1. **Actions**

- add - add, plus
- subtract - remove, minus
- delete - delete, trash
- edit - edit, pencil
- save - save, disk
- arrow-upload - upload
- arrow-download - download
- arrow-clockwise - refresh, reload
- search - search, magnifier
- share - share
- print - print
- settings - settings, gear
- filter - filter
- lock-closed - lock
- lock-open - unlock
- heart - favorite, heart
- star - favorite, star
- info - info
- question-circle - help, question
- alert - warning, alert
- sign-out - logout, sign out
- sign-in - login, sign in

## 2. **Navigation / Arrows**

- arrow-up - arrow up
- arrow-down - arrow down
- arrow-left - arrow left
- arrow-right - arrow right
- chevron-up - chevron up
- chevron-down - chevron down
- chevron-left - chevron left
- chevron-right - chevron right
- arrow-previous - back
- arrow-next - forward
- arrow-expand - expand
- arrow-collapse-all - collapse
- navigation - menu, hamburger
- dismiss - close, x, times
- more-horizontal - more, ellipsis horizontal
- more-vertical - more, ellipsis vertical
- home - home
- location - location, pin
- map - map

## 3. **Media**

- play - play
- pause - pause
- stop - stop
- record - record
- fast-forward - fast forward
- rewind - rewind
- next - next
- previous - previous
- speaker-2 - volume up
- speaker-1 - volume down
- speaker-mute - mute
- camera - camera
- image - image, photo
- video - video
- music-note-1 - music, audio, note
- mic - microphone

## 4. **Text & Alignment**

- text-bold - bold
- text-italic - italic
- text-underline - underline
- text-strikethrough - strikethrough
- text-align-left - align left
- text-align-center - align center
- text-align-right - align right
- text-align-justify - align justify
- text-bullet-list - list, bullet
- text-number-list-rotate-90 - list, numbered
- text-quote - quote
- link - link
- link-dismiss - unlink
- text-font-size - text size, font

## 5. **Communication**

- chat - chat, message, bubble
- mail - email, envelope
- phone - phone, call
- person - contact, person, user
- people - group, users
- alert - notification, bell
- calendar - calendar, date
- attach - attachment, paperclip

## 6. **Files & Folders**

- document - file, document
- folder - folder
- document-add - new file
- folder-add - new folder
- arrow-upload - upload
- arrow-download - download
- archive - archive, zip
- copy - copy
- cut - cut
- clipboard-paste - paste

## 7. **Devices & Hardware**

- desktop - computer, desktop
- laptop - laptop
- tablet - tablet
- phone - smartphone, mobile
- smartwatch - watch
- print - printer
- battery-10 - battery full
- battery-0 - battery empty
- battery-charge - battery charging
- wifi-4 - wifi, signal
- bluetooth - bluetooth

## 8. **E-commerce**

- cart - cart
- shopping-bag - shopping bag
- tag - tag, price
- credit-card-clock - credit card, payment
- receipt - receipt
- heart - wishlist, heart

## 9. **Status & Feedback**

- checkmark - check, tick
- dismiss - cross, x
- error-circle - error
- alert - warning, alert
- info - info
- spinner-ios - loading, spinner
- checkmark-circle - success, done

## 12. **AI & Language Model Interactions**

- bot - chatbot, bot, robot
- brain-circuit - AI, brain, neural network
- wand - magic wand, sparkles
- chat-bubbles-question - conversation, dialogue, speech bubbles
- prompt - prompt, input
- chat - response, output
- autocomplete (not found, use "sparkle" for suggestion) - auto-complete, suggestion
- translate - translate, language
- mic - voice input, microphone
- read-aloud - text-to-speech, speaker
- code - code, brackets
- document-one-page-sparkle - document with stars, AI-generated docs
- lightbulb - lightbulb, suggestions, ideas
- history - history, clock
- arrow-clockwise - regenerate, refresh
- thumb-like - thumbs up, feedback
- thumb-dislike - thumbs down, feedback
- shield - shield, privacy
- person-bot (not found, use "bot-sparkle") - user with robot, human-AI collaboration
- question-circle - question mark, ask AI
- star - star, highlight
- copy - copy

## 13. **Weather**

- weather-sunny - sun, sunny, clear
- weather-moon - moon, night
- weather-cloudy - cloud, cloudy
- weather-partly-cloudy-day - partly cloudy, sun behind cloud
- weather-rain - rain, rainy, drizzle
- weather-thunderstorm - thunderstorm, lightning
- weather-snowflake - snow, snowflake
- weather-squalls - wind, windy
- weather-fog - fog, mist
- weather-duststorm - tornado, cyclone
- temperature - thermometer, hot, cold
- umbrella - umbrella
- weather-sunny-high - sunrise
- weather-sunny-low - sunset
- temperature - temperature high, low
- drop - humidity, droplet
- gauge - barometer, pressure

## 11. **Miscellaneous**

- star - star, favorite
- eye - eye, view
- eye-off - hide
- globe - globe, world
- dark-theme - sun, moon, light, dark mode
- trophy - trophy, award
- bookmark - bookmark
- flag - flag
- bug - bug, issues, debugging
- cloud - cloud
- cloud-arrow-up - cloud upload
- cloud-arrow-down - cloud download
- fire - fire, trending, hot
- leaf-one - leaf, eco, nature
- gift - gift, present, reward
- key - key, security, access
- shield - shield, protection, security
- rocket - rocket, launch, startup
- lightbulb - lightbulb, idea, inspiration
- compass-northwest - compass, navigation, explore
- color - palette, design, color
- hourglass - hourglass, time, waiting
- thermometer (use "temperature") - thermometer, temperature, health
- umbrella - umbrella, weather, protection
- animal-paw-print - paw, pet, animal
- barcode-scanner - barcode, scan, product
- map - map, location, directions
- glasses - glasses, view, preview, reading
- ribbon - medal, achievement, award
- crown - crown, leader, premium
- alert - bell, notification, alert
- calendar - calendar, date, schedule
- clipboard - clipboard, copy, notes, tasks
- data-pie - pie chart, analytics, stats
- data-bar-vertical - bar chart, data, performance
- wallet - wallet, money, finance
- handshake - handshake, agreement, partnership
- recycle - recycle, sustainability, eco
- cut - scissors, cut, edit
- wand - wand, magic, effects
- plug-connected - plug, connect, power
- luggage - suitcase, travel, business
- ticket-horizontal - ticket, event, pass
- balloon - balloon, celebration, party
- weather-snowflake - snowflake, weather, cold, unique

## Additional Icons

For icons beyond the 200 most common ones listed above, direct users to the [Vibe Icon Search App](https://aipx-proto.github.io/vibe-icon/) where they can browse and search the complete icon library.
